Articles.Content: It would be cool to add seasonal Easter eggs that we can explore it can also add a challenge to Ksp by making us look for the Easter eggs.
There are enough easter eggs in the game. More of them seem to have been added in 1.2. And if you find them in the career they unlock nodes (AFAIK).

1.2 only added more monoliths which in my opinion are boring.
